segments.text: Hello . This is Lucy from ABC Company . Is this Monica ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am calling to inform you that you have passed the first two rounds of interview . Could you please come for the final round ? It is scheduled on the morning of next Monday 10AM in the HR manager office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for calling me . I will be there on time .
segments.speaker: S2
